global.title: Moxxy
global.moxxySubtitle: An experiment into building a modern, easy and beautiful XMPP client.

channels.messagesChannelDescription: The notification channel for received messages

messages.retractedFallback: A previous message has been retracted but your client does not support it

filePicker.permissionDenied: The storage permission has been denied.

omemo.couldNotPublish: Could not publish the cryptographic identity to the server. This means that end-to-end encryption may not work.
omemo.notEncryptedForDevice: This message was not encrypted for this device

connection.unrecoverable: Connection lost due to unrecoverable error

login.startTlsFailed: Failed to establish a secure connection

message.contactDoesntSupportOmemo: The contact does not support encryption using OMEMO:2
message.serviceUnavailable: The message could not be delivered to the contact
message.remoteServerTimeout: The message could not be delivered to the contact's server
message.remoteServerNotFound: The message could not be delivered to the contact's server as it cannot be found
message.failedToEncrypt: The message could not be encrypted
message.failedToEncryptFile: The file could not be encrypted
message.failedToDecryptFile: The file could not be decrypted
message.fileNotEncrypted: The chat is encrypted but the file is not encrypted

conversation.openFileNoAppError: No app found to open this file

newChat.remoteServerError: Failed to contact the remote server.
newChat.groupchatUnsupported: Joining a groupchat is currently not supported.

conversation.holdForLonger: Hold button longer to record a voice message

intro.noAccount: Have no XMPP account? No worries, creating one is really easy.

conversations.closeChatBody: Are you sure you want to close the chat with ${conversationTitle}?

conversation.closeChatConfirmSubtext: Are you sure you want to close this chat?
conversation.retractBody: Are you sure you want to retract the message? Keep in mind that this is only a request that the client does not have to honour.
conversation.addToContactsBody: Are you sure you want to add ${jid} to your contacts?
conversation.stickerPickerNoStickersLine1: You have no sticker packs installed.
conversation.stickerPickerNoStickersLine2: They can be installed in the sticker settings.

newDeviceMessage.one: A new device has been added
newDeviceMessage.other: Multiple new devices have been added

startchat.title: New Chat
startchat.subtitle: You can start a new chat by either entering a XMPP address or by scanning their QR code.

shareselection.confirmBody: One or more chats are unencrypted. This means that the file will be leaked to the server. Do you still want to continue?

owndevices.title: Own Devices
owndevices.deleteDeviceConfirmBody: This means that contacts will not be able to encrypt for that device. Continue?
owndevices.recreateOwnSessionsConfirmBody: This will recreate the cryptographic sessions with your own devices. Use only if your own devices throw decryption errors.
owndevices.recreateOwnDeviceConfirmBody: This will recreate this device's cryptographic identity. It will take some time. If contacts verified your device, they will have to do it again. Continue?

devices.title: Security
devices.recreateSessionsConfirmBody: This will recreate the cryptographic sessions with your own devices. Use only if your own devices throw decryption errors.
devices.noSessions: There are no cryptographic sessions that are used for end-to-end encryption.

blocklist.title: Blocklist
blocklist.unblockAllConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to unblock all users?
blocklist.unblockJidConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to unblock ${jid}? You will receive messages from this user again.

stickerPack.removeConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to remove this sticker pack?
stickerPack.installConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to install this sticker pack?
stickerPack.restricted: This sticker pack is restricted. That means that the stickers will be displayed but cannot be sent.
stickerPack.fetchingFailure: Could not find the sticker pack

settings.title: Settings
settings.signOutConfirmBody: You are about to sign out. Proceed?

conversation.title: Chat
conversation.selectBackgroundImageDescription: This image will be the background of all your chats
conversation.removeBackgroundImageConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to remove your conversation background image?
conversation.newChatsE2EE: Enable end-to-end encryption by default. WARNING: Experimental
conversation.contactsIntegrationBody: When enabled, data from the phonebook will be used to provide chat titles and profile pictures. No data will be sent to the server.

debugging.title: Debugging options
debugging.generalEncryptionPasswordSubtext: The logs may contain sensitive information so pick a strong passphrase
debugging.generalLoggingIpSubtext: The IP the logs should be sent to
debugging.generalLoggingPortSubtext: The IP the logs should be sent to

network.title: Network
network.automaticDownloadsText: Moxxy will automatically download files on...
network.automaticDownloadsMaximumSizeSubtext: The maximum file size for a file to be automatically downloaded

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.showContactRequestsSubtext: This will show people who added you to their contact list but sent no message yet
privacy.profilePictureVisibilitSubtext: If enabled, everyone can see your profile picture. If disabled, only users on your contact list can see your profile picture.
privacy.sendChatMarkersSubtext: This will tell your conversation partner if you received or read a message
privacy.sendChatStatesSubtext: This will show your conversation partner if you are typing or looking at the chat
privacy.redirectText: This will redirect $serviceName links that you tap to a proxy service, e.g. $exampleProxy
privacy.cannotEnableRedirectSubtext: You must first set a proxy service to redirect to. To do so, tap the field next to the switch.
privacy.stickersPrivacySubtext: If enabled, everyone will be able to see your list of installed sticker packs.

stickers.title: Stickers
stickers.autoDownloadBody: If enabled, stickers are automatically downloaded when the sender is in your contact list.

removeOldMedia.title: Remove old media
removeOldMedia.description: Removes old media files from the device

confirmation.body: Are you sure you want to delete old media files?
